attributes.action: Stop The Hate Against The Duchess Of Sussex!
attributes.additional_details: On social media, there are hundreds (and more)  hate accounts and troll accounts and even normal accounts that are bashing the duchess. It is absolutely unacceptable, and those people are being racially and culturally abusive. These accounts and comments can be found on YouTube, Instagram, Twitter, Facebook and any other social media platform out there. This isn’t just “opinions” anymore, this is bullying.
attributes.background: Ever since Meghan Markle joined the British Royal Family, she has been a victim of hate and online bullying and trolling. This is not something anyone should have to put up with, especially someone who is just trying to live their life and isn’t doing anything wrong.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
